short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mutes and hides YouTube ads and reloads to skip them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rather than completely blocking the YouTube ads, YouTube Ads Muter (YTAM) automatically mutes and hides YouTube ads and reloads to skip them.

- YTAM mutes and hides Youtube video and display ads.
- After a short delay, YTAM reloads the page to skip the video ads.
(YTAM periodically updates the URL with your video's timestamp, so you can continue watching after the reload.)
